concept.title: Configuring the Smart Router for SurePay interworking

conbody.p: This chapter describes how to configure the NCC as a Smart Router. The NCC can be configured as the Smart Router to work between the external network and SurePay providing the capabilities to interwork between 5G and 4G networks. SurePay requires that all 5G http/2 message protocol parameters are converted to 4G message protocol parameters.

The NCC functions as the Smart Router between the SMF and a Drouter only, from which the message is sent on to SurePay. The messages can be sent to a specific Drouter/Surepay based on a configurable lookup of the destination OCS. You enable the plugin once and use it for as long as it is needed. As message processing is done on SurePay in this scenario no request will be processed locally by the NCC. The Smart Router runs in both the request chain and the response chain on the Diameter applications.
